name: In the Matter of L. Morris GLUCKSMAN.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of L. Morris GLUCKSMAN.
casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of L. Morris GLUCKSMAN.
No. D-2918.
Supreme Court of the United States
Oct. 3, 2016.
L. Morris Glucksman, of Stamford, Connecticut, having requested to resign as a member of the Bar of this Court, it is ordered that his name be stricken from the roll of attorneys admitted to the practice of law before this Court. The Rule to Show Cause, issued on August 8, 2016, is discharged.
